column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/ecd67a142066ba7e5e2a92d152cb8bfb156d6f69 for binaries and test log.\n
Will this fix still work after all the commits done lately?\n

Yes, as there were no recent changes to signverifymessagedialog.ui this commit will merge just fine to current master.

@laanwj Ping :)
Can we get this merged please?\n
This seems to change both sign and verify to alt-m ?\n
@sipa Indeed, but they are on different tabs and each tab is reached by the now changed shortcut, so that we now have a shortcut to reach the tab and a shortcut to execute the sign or verify :).\n
Tested: indeed, typing alt-m triggers the shortcut in the current tab\n
